<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Draconic Scent](/Feats.aspx?ID=1942) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 168 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Dragon Disciple](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=56)

**Prerequisites**
[Dragon Disciple Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1940)

</column>

---

Your sense of smell is uncanny, much like a dragon's. You gain [imprecise scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=417) with a range of 30 feet. The GM might double the range if you're downwind from the creature or halve the range if you're upwind, at their discretion.
name: Draconic Scent
